original_text: Moses shook oil on the altar seven times. He put oil on the altar table and on all the tools to use with it. He put oil on the washing dish and on the table on which it stood.
korean_text: 또 제단에 일곱 번 뿌리고 또 그 제단과 그 모든 기구와 물두멍과 그 받침에 발라 거룩하게 하고

sentences.original_text: Moses shook oil on the altar seven times.
sentences.korean_translation: 모세는 제단에 일곱 번 기름을 뿌렸습니다.

sentences.original_text: He put oil on the altar table
and on all the tools to use with it.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것과 함께 사용할 모든 기구에도 기름을 발랐습니다.

sentences.original_text: He put oil on the washing dish
and on the table on which it stood.
